content:
Is it true that given an Artin local ring with perfect residue field k of characteristic p, this Artin ring inherits a canonical W(k)-algebra structure? Do we have this construction in mathlib?

I've got a student (@Sebastian Monnet) working on Mazur's deformation theory.
Nope, we don't have this. (I don't even know if it's true...)
We don't really have the universal property of Witt vectors in that direction.
